text: Nanara, Yesu naxa, “Mangan gbeen xa so a yii, Ala gbeen xa so Ala yii.”20.25 Mangan yɛtagin sawuran to gbeti gbananna ma, na a findixi a gbeen na bayo a tan nan a rafalaxi. Adamadiine daxi Ala maligan na, nayi e fan findixi Ala gbeen na. Gbetin lan a so mangan yii mudun na, koni muxune lan e yi e yɛtɛ so Ala yii bayo e findixi e da mangan gbeen na.
